trans-unit.source: A special kind of property that can be defined or attached to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一種特殊的屬性，可以定義或附加至<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of dependency properties: instance properties, meta properties, and attached properties.
trans-unit.target: 有三種類型的相依性屬性︰ 執行個體屬性、 中繼屬性和附加的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Dependency properties support three use cases.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]相依性屬性支援三個使用案例。

trans-unit.source: First, if an instance property of an activity is implemented by using a dependency property, that property can be assigned an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> instead of an actual value.
trans-unit.target: 首先，如果活動的執行個體屬性使用相依性屬性來實作，該屬性也可以指派<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>而不是實際的值。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>

trans-unit.source: Second, activity properties that are metadata (that is, the value cannot change at run time) should be implemented by using dependency properties, specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> option.
trans-unit.target: 第二個，活動的屬性中繼資料 （也就是值無法變更執行階段） 應該使用指定的相依性屬性來實作<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>選項。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>

trans-unit.source: Third, dependency properties support attached properties, which are properties that are applied to dependency objects dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 第三，相依性屬性支援附加的屬性，也就是以動態方式套用至相依性物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> that represents user-defined data for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> ，表示這個使用者定義資料<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

Gets the registered <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得已註冊<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>根據<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The required value of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.

The registered <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.
Creates an <xref:System.Collections.IList> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that belong to a specific <xref:System.Type>.
The <xref:System.Type>.
<xref:System.Collections.IList> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that belong to a specific <xref:System.Type>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code computed here is the `bitwise AND` of the hash codes generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> attributes of this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 以下是計算的雜湊程式碼`bitwise AND`所產生的雜湊程式碼<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>，和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A>屬性的這個<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is associated to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> by registration.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性，指出是否此<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>與其相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>登錄。

trans-unit.source: The value returned indicates whether this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> has been registered by using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值指出是否此<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>已註冊使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>方法。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if attached to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果附加至<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is an event <xref:System.Delegate>.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性，指出是否<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>是<xref:System.Delegate>.</xref:System.Delegate>的事件

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is an event <xref:System.Delegate>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>事件<xref:System.Delegate>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Delegate>

This represents the name of the property or event that is being mirrored by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 這表示屬性或事件<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>要進行鏡像的名稱
